member.name: T:MainClass
member.summary: The main class for testing the MatrixMath.Transpose method.

member.name: M:MainClass.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:MatrixMath
member.summary: This class contains methods for performing operations on matrices.

member.name: M:MatrixMath.Transpose(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Calculates the transpose of a matrix. The transpose is a new matrix created by swapping the rows and columns.
member.param: The matrix for which to find the transpose.
member.returns: A new matrix representing the transpose of the original matrix.
